name: async-observable
description: Observable implementation using TypeScript, async/await and AsyncIterables.

scripts.build-es5-umd: npm run build -- --target es5 --module umd --outDir dist/es5-umd
scripts.build-es5-esm: npm run build -- --target es5 --module es6 --outDir dist/es5-esm
scripts.build-es2015-esm: npm run build -- --target es2015 --module es6 --outDir dist/es2015-esm
scripts.build-esnext: npm run build --target esnext --module esnext --outDir dist/esnext
scripts.build-all: rm -rf dist && (npm run build-es5-umd & npm run build-es5-esm & npm run build-es2015-umd & npm run build-es2015-esm & npm run build-esnext)
scripts.docs: ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --name async-observable --readme README.md --module commonjs --target ES5 --excludeExternals --out docs --theme default src/

author: Niklas KÃ¼htmann
